attributes.attribute03:
select title
     , description
     , link
     , icon
from (
select nvl(e.alias, e.name) || ': ' || nvl(t.alias, t.name) AS title
     , 'Change to Track' AS description
     , apex_util.prepare_url (p_url => 'f?p='||:APP_ID||':100:'||:APP_SESSION||':BRANCH_TO_PAGE_ACCEPT:' || :DEBUG || '::P100_EVENT_ID,P100_TRACK_ID:' || t.event_id || ',' || t.id) as link
     , 'fa-rocket' AS icon
  FROM ks_events_allowed_v e
     , ks_event_tracks t
where e.id = t.event_id
  and e.active_ind = 'Y'
order by e.begin_date desc, nvl(t.alias, t.name)
)
union all
select title
     , description
     , link
     , icon
from (
SELECT decode(aap.page_id, 1, 'Home', aap.page_title) AS title
      ,'Go to page > ' || decode(aap.page_id, 1, 'Home', aap.page_title) AS description
      ,apex_page.get_url(p_page => aap.page_id) AS link
      ,'fa-arrow-right' AS icon
  FROM apex_application_pages aap
 WHERE aap.application_id = :APP_ID
   AND aap.page_mode = 'Normal'
   AND aap.page_requires_authentication = 'Yes'
   AND (   aap.page_id between 1 and 5000       
       and aap.page_id != 100
       and (aap.page_id not in (2, 10, 20) and :P1_TRACK_ID is null or :P1_TRACK_ID is not null)
   )
 ORDER BY aap.page_id
)
